/**

module.exports = {
  UP: 12,
  DOWN: 13,
  LEFT: 14,
  RIGHT: 15,
  SHARE: 8,
  OPTIONS: 9,
  PS: 16,
  TOUCHBAR: 17,
  X: 0,
  CIRCLE: 1,
  SQUARE: 2,
  TRIANGLE: 3,
  L1: 4,
  R1: 5,
  L2: 6,
  R2: 7,
  L3: 10,
  R3: 11,
  LEFT_STICK_H: 0,
  LEFT_STICK_V: 1,
  RIGHT_STICK_H: 2,
  RIGHT_STICK_V: 3
};
